001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetIDPSegmentResponse;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.IDPSegmentResponse;
011
012import java.util.Set;
013
014/**
015 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetIDPSegmentResponse}, opCode -86, size 17
016 *
017 * <br>
018 *
019 * 
020 * <table border='1'>
021 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
022 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-86</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
023 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>17</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
024 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
025 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
026 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
027 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.SetIDPSegmentResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
028 * </table>
029 */
030@MessageProps(
031    opCode=-86,
032    size=17,
033    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
034    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
035    signed=true,
036    response=SetIDPSegmentResponse.class
037)
038public class SetIDPSegmentRequest extends Message {
039    private int idpId;
040    private int segmentIndex;
041    private IDPSegmentOperation operation;
042    private int operationId;
043    private int profileStartTime;
044    private int profileBasalRate;
045    private long profileCarbRatio;
046    private int profileTargetBG;
047    private int profileISF;
048    private int idpStatusId;
049    private Set<IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus> idpStatus;
050
051    public SetIDPSegmentRequest() {}
052
053    public SetIDPSegmentRequest(byte[] raw) {
054        parse(raw);
055    }
056
057    /**
058     * @param idpId the insulin delivery profile ID (NOT SLOT)
059     */
060    public SetIDPSegmentRequest(int idpId, int segmentIndex, IDPSegmentOperation operation, int profileStartTime, int profileBasalRate, long profileCarbRatio, int profileTargetBG, int profileISF, int idpStatusId) {
061        this.cargo = buildCargo(idpId, segmentIndex, operation.id, profileStartTime, profileBasalRate, profileCarbRatio, profileTargetBG, profileISF, idpStatusId);
062        this.idpId = idpId;
063        this.segmentIndex = segmentIndex;
064        this.operation = operation;
065        this.operationId = operation.id;
066        this.profileStartTime = profileStartTime;
067        this.profileBasalRate = profileBasalRate;
068        this.profileCarbRatio = profileCarbRatio;
069        this.profileTargetBG = profileTargetBG;
070        this.profileISF = profileISF;
071        this.idpStatusId = idpStatusId;
072        this.idpStatus = getIdpStatus();
073
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * <table border="1">
078     * <caption>Parsed fields for SetIDPSegmentRequest:</caption>
079     * <tr><td><code>idpId</code></td><td><code>raw[0]</code></td></tr>
080     * <tr><td><code>segmentIndex</code></td><td><code>raw[2]</code></td></tr>
081     * <tr><td><code>operationId</code></td><td><code>raw[3]</code></td></tr>
082     * <tr><td><code>operation</code></td><td><code>getOperation()</code></td></tr>
083     * <tr><td><code>profileStartTime</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 4)</code></td></tr>
084     * <tr><td><code>profileBasalRate</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 6)</code></td></tr>
085     * <tr><td><code>profileCarbRatio</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 8)</code></td></tr>
086     * <tr><td><code>profileTargetBG</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 12)</code></td></tr>
087     * <tr><td><code>profileISF</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 14)</code></td></tr>
088     * <tr><td><code>idpStatusId</code></td><td><code>raw[16]</code></td></tr>
089     * <tr><td><code>idpStatus</code></td><td><code>getIdpStatus()</code></td></tr>
090     * </table>
091     */
092    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
093        raw = this.removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
094        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
095        this.cargo = raw;
096        this.idpId = raw[0];
097        this.segmentIndex = raw[2];
098        this.operationId = raw[3];
099        this.operation = getOperation();
100        this.profileStartTime = Bytes.readShort(raw, 4);
101        this.profileBasalRate = Bytes.readShort(raw, 6);
102        this.profileCarbRatio = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 8);
103        this.profileTargetBG = Bytes.readShort(raw, 12);
104        this.profileISF = Bytes.readShort(raw, 14);
105        this.idpStatusId = raw[16];
106        this.idpStatus = getIdpStatus();
107
108    }
109
110
111    /**
112     * <table border="1">
113     * <caption>Byte layout for SetIDPSegmentRequest.buildCargo(...):</caption>
114     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
115     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>new byte[]{(byte) idpId} [element 0]</code></td></tr>
116     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>new byte[]{1} [element 1]</code></td></tr>
117     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>new byte[]{(byte) segmentIndex} [element 0]</code></td></tr>
118     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>new byte[]{(byte) operationId} [element 1]</code></td></tr>
119     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileStartTime) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
120     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileStartTime) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
121     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileBasalRate) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
122     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileBasalRate) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
123     * <tr><td>8</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
124     * <tr><td>9</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
125     * <tr><td>10</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
126     * <tr><td>11</td><td><code>toUint32(profileCarbRatio) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
127     * <tr><td>12</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileTargetBG) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
128     * <tr><td>13</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileTargetBG) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
129     * <tr><td>14</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileISF) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
130     * <tr><td>15</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileISF) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
131     * <tr><td>16</td><td><code>(byte) idpStatusId</code></td></tr>
132     * </table>
133     */
134    public static byte[] buildCargo(int idpId, int segmentIndex, int operationId, int profileStartTime, int profileBasalRate, long profileCarbRatio, int profileTargetBG, int profileISF, int idpStatusId) {
135        return Bytes.combine(
136                new byte[]{ (byte) idpId, 1 },
137                new byte[]{ (byte) segmentIndex, (byte) operationId },
138                Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileStartTime),
139                Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileBasalRate),
140                Bytes.toUint32(profileCarbRatio),
141                Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileTargetBG),
142                Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(profileISF),
143                new byte[]{ (byte) idpStatusId });
144    }
145
146    public int getIdpId() {
147        return idpId;
148    }
149    public int getSegmentIndex() {
150        return segmentIndex;
151    }
152    public int getProfileStartTime() {
153        return profileStartTime;
154    }
155    public int getProfileBasalRate() {
156        return profileBasalRate;
157    }
158    public long getProfileCarbRatio() {
159        return profileCarbRatio;
160    }
161    public int getProfileTargetBG() {
162        return profileTargetBG;
163    }
164    public int getProfileISF() {
165        return profileISF;
166    }
167    public int getStatusId() {
168        return idpStatusId;
169    }
170    public Set<IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus> getIdpStatus() {
171        return IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.fromBitmask(idpStatusId);
172    }
173
174    public enum IDPSegmentOperation {
175        /**
176         * Modifies the given segmentId
177         */
178        MODIFY(0),
179        /**
180         * Creates a new segment AFTER the current segmentId
181         */
182        CREATE_AFTER(1),
183        /**
184         * Deletes the given segmentId
185         */
186        DELETE(2),
187        ;
188
189        private final int id;
190        IDPSegmentOperation(int id) {
191            this.id = id;
192        }
193
194        public int getId() {
195            return id;
196        }
197
198        public static IDPSegmentOperation fromId(int id) {
199            for (IDPSegmentOperation o : values()) {
200                if (o.id == id) {
201                    return o;
202                }
203            }
204            return null;
205        }
206    }
207
208    public int getOperationId() {
209        return operationId;
210    }
211
212    public IDPSegmentOperation getOperation() {
213        return IDPSegmentOperation.fromId(operationId);
214    }
215}
